narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Elev8 Center New Jersey, LLC is a Substance Abuse Rehabilitation Facility provider based in Newark, NJ. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $29.4M in Medicaid payments across 43K claims serving 0 beneficiaries.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $29.4M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
